boardgame.name: Dungeon Command: Tyranny of Goblins
boardgame.description: Dungeon Command: Tyranny of Goblins is a card-driven skirmish game played on modular interlocking map tiles that uses order cards, creature cards and miniatures. The object of the game is to have the highest remaining Morale when an opposing warband's Morale has been reduced to 0 or below, or if a player ends his or her turn with no creatures on the battlefield._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a player, you take on the role of a commander, sending a warband to battle the forces arrayed against you. You recruit troops and deploy them on the battlefield. You issue orders to those creatures, outfit them with spells and equipment, and direct their tactics to break the morale of your enemies and drive them from the field._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dungeon Command: Tyranny of Goblins includes twelve miniatures, such as a horned devil, a troll, a bugbear, hobgoblins, and goblins. While each Dungeon Command faction is meant to be played by a single player, quick-start rules allow two players to engage in a shortened version of the game using only one box. Dungeon Command is designed for two players, although up to four can play with a few adjustments explained under the advanced rules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integratable with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Blood of Gruumsh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Curse of Undeath_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Heart of Cormyr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeon Command: Sting of Lolth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can also integrate with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Castle Ravenloft Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Wrath of Ashardalon Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons: Temple of Elemental Evil Board Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All components, tiles, instructions, and box are in near mint condition. I will be shipping USPS (30.00 total with shipping). Please check my Trade and Market Rating for reliability. I will also combine shipping with other items if possible. Thanks!

NEW SET WITHOUT ORDER CARDS. You pick any store you want - one you have credit in, one you want to buy anything else from - and we make an order shipped to your place. When it arrives you ship the order cards to me (Poland). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m interested in all sets, so we can save on shipping. You make an order and I reimbruse you the difference or vice versa. The offer is based on the current price in coolstuffinc of 28$ and subject to scale according to the actual price in the store of your choosing.
*** New in Shrink *** Amazon e-payment preferred.
Standard shipping is $15 flat rate for most games. I will happily combine shipping on multiple game purchases. Some games are very small (eg Agricola Decks). Allow $9 for these.
